hotels.title: Maldives All-Inclusive Overwater Villas with Unlimited Free-Flow Drinks & Roundtrip Seaplane Transfers
hotels.description: Barefoot luxury meets untamed ocean magic at this five-star island retreat, nestled in the heart of the South Ari Atoll. Barceló Whale Lagoon Maldives embraces crystal waters and flaunts incredible sunsets that paint the sky in impossible colours. Here, time slows to island rhythm while luxury touches wrap around you like a warm tropical breeze. Dive into pure bliss at the twin infinity pools that melt seamlessly into endless horizons, then embark on a culinary odyssey that'll make your soul sing, from exquisite fine dining at Aqua Restaurant to globe-trotting flavours at Sea Salt, where Middle Eastern spices dance with South American fire. Finally, drift to the enchanting Magical Pool Bar for sunrise snacks and sunset cocktails. This paradise is surrounded by an underwater wonderland that hosts the ocean's most magnificent creatures, including majestic whale sharks and graceful manta rays. Some of the world's best snorkelling reveals coral gardens teeming with tropical fish and clear waters invite you to swim alongside nature's most spectacular marine ballet.

hotels.title: Iconic Maldives Outrigger Villa Luxury in the Heart of the South Ari Atoll
hotels.description: It’s the world-famous barefoot luxury you love in the world’s most spectacular destination: Outrigger Maldives Maafushivaru Resort has it all. Surrounded by lush gardens, warm sands and the brilliant-blue South Ari Atoll, you'll never want to leave this all-inclusive space. Step beyond your overwater villa and embrace a different activity every day - drift into bliss at Navasana Spa, sample lobster and grilled sirloin at Moodhu Grill or savour teppanyaki thrills at Koto.
